content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard cleaning my pool around 10:00-11:00pm at night, my pool lights were on. i just happened to look up and seen 4 large lights in a square formation coming towards my home moving slowly with no sound,low from the sky, i then ran into the house to alert my husband to come outside. when i turned around i noticed that the 4 large lights transformed into 1 red ball of light and was moving faster then before then my husband and i watched it go straight up into the sky super fast until it disappeared. what did i think the object was when i first noticed it, you ask? it was a ufo, planes dont frighten me this did. no blinking lights of any kind just red very large still lights no sound.
content.summary: Witnessed 4 large lights in a square formation, transformed into 1 large light and went straight up into the sky then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on june 17 around 1145 close to midnight smoking outside when i seen a light in the sky look like a star at first so i paid no attention to it then it got bigger and brighter and was moving with precision so it knew where it was going and then i seen what i assumed to be two military jets then the light turned bright orange and dissapeared. today june 19th around same time i seen it again so i got it on camera dissapeared again with the jets closing in again.
content.summary: Moving light i have more videos

content.detailedDescription:
It was a hot day approx. 103 degrees with thin cloud cover. i was outside and i looked northwest of my location and saw a group of vapor trails that looked to be angling downward. from what i can see there was at least 10 seperate vapor trails but all appeared to be going the same direction. the best way i can describe these trails would be as if all the objects broke the sound barrior at the same time and same altitude where it leaves a short puff of condensation or as if all objects went through a thin layer of moist atmosphere leaving a trail. all the objects trails were very close to the same altitude. i looked at it for a few minutes and picked up my cell phone and took a picture. the first picture clearly showed all the vapor trails and it looked just like what i was seeing with my naked eye. i then took a second picture making sure this time to include the roofs of the neighboring houses so you can see how large this formation was. what i found odd is that even between the 2 pictures you can see the clouds in the background were moving but the trails stayed close to the same place. you can also tell the trails were below the cloud cover. my best description would be that i saw the rements of a large group of objects that were in a formation... a group all about the altitude, leaving vapor trails of very close to equal length. when i looked at the photos it does appear that some of these objects were of different sizes.
the pictures were taken by a dell streak 5 cellphone which i do believe has a 5 mega-pixal camera.
content.summary: Group of 10 objects leave vapor trail all at the same angle.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard late this evening with my husband and our 2 dogs when i noticed this green "star". as soon as i looked at it, it just dropped out of the sky and seemed to shoot itself forward into the sky (south from where i was looking). then it just faded away. my husband caught the tail end of what i saw. i've also seen a purple "star" do the same thing except move west to east in the sky. both with in a matter of 10 seconds or less.
content.summary: Green light fell from the sky and seemed to shoot forward and fade away

content.detailedDescription: Unable to sleep, i was up at 3:00 am pdt, monday june 18 and looked out the window toward the southwest, to see a peculiar looking star that was pulsating and emitting multiple colors randomly. these were bright emissions almost like a camera flash but very far away so the object appeared quite tiny. i then looked at the object through our 10 power nikon binoculars and not only was the object larger but i could also resolve individual light sources as they flashed different colors randomly.  i watched the object for 45 minutes and it remained solidly affixed to that spot in the nighttime sky  until near the end of my observation when it slowly drifted to a point that was in a somewhat westerly direction and perhaps a lower altitude from the altitude while originally hovering..  this put the object behind some trees, so it was no longer visible to me. while on the stationary hover the object was approximately 45 degrees above the horizon and i estimate that the object was at least a mile away.
content.summary: Starting at 3:00 am observed a hovering object with bright multi-colored pulsating lights.  this made to object brighter and more active than any of the stars and planets visible that night.  it hovered for 45 min. then slowly moved to another location

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when i saw a bright light. it looked almost like a flare or something on fire. it was incredibly bright and larger than the moon. when i turned to corner to stop and look the ball came closer and was a triangular craft with a headlight in front. it was very close to the ground and moved slowly but was silent. i could see the outline was a triangle not a plane. then it just took off and was gone within a few seconds.I thought i would be terrified if i ever saw a ufo but i was strangely calm. my first reaction was to follow the light but it came to me.
content.summary: Bright light that came towards me and truned out to be a triangular craft that shot away after a about 30 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in backyard saw this.
content.summary: Fast moving star like object moving in a straight line, followed by arc path. over crystal lake

content.detailedDescription: This started about 3 months ago,i took pics of storm clouds, downloaded them onto my laptop. when i changed the exposure i started to see these things that should not have been there.I started to take pics of the sky everyday... clouds, sunsets, chemtrails... you name it, and these objects started showing up. when i would look at them closer there are basicly two types, first and most prevelent are orb type, then there are what look like long thin black lines. these objects love to hide in clouds, i have probably over one hundred pics of these things that should not be there. i uploaded a few of these pics and if you download them and play with the settings, wait till you see whats there (amazing). i am a little bummed about them because i just never expected to see all these things in the sky.( keep on looking up )
content.summary: These orbs and stick like objects appear in the clouds.Also seem to monitor plane emissions.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way home from an event at about 9:48.  i was on the highway driving home when i noticed a bright reddish-yellow sphere to the right of my car right above the treetops. the object was probably about a hundred feet away.  when i first saw the object i thought that it was a light from a helicopter.  i was led to this assumption because the light seemed to blink and pulsate.  i continued to watch the light and while i was watching it it pulsated one more time and then disappeared.  about 20 seconds after it disappeared a new one "formed".  i then happened to look out of my window again and noticed a large triangle formed out of what looked like three small orbs.  the three orbs seemed to be turning in sync which leads me to believe that they were all apart of one "mother-ship" i guess you could call it.  this was the first time i have ever seen something like this.
content.summary: It was a bright blinking sphere.  it pulsated and then disappeared, after it disappeared another one appeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way home from an event at about 9:48.  i was on the highway driving home when i noticed a bright reddish-yellow sphere to the right of my car right above the treetops. the object was probably about a hundred feet away.  when i first saw the object i thought that it was a light from a helicopter.  i was led to this assumption because the light seemed to blink and pulsate.  i continued to watch the light and while i was watching it it pulsated one more time and then disappeared.  about 20 seconds after it disappeared a new one "formed".  i then happened to look out of my window again and noticed a large triangle formed out of what looked like three small orbs.  the three orbs seemed to be turning in sync which leads me to believe that they were all apart of one "mother-ship" i guess you could call it.  this was the first time i have ever seen something like this.
content.summary: It was a bright blinking sphere.  it pulsated and then disappeared, after it disappeared another one appeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had just went to bed and was dozing off when i was suddenly grabbed and felt a terrible shift in the atmosphere...I felt a paralyzingl bubble that enveloped my body and restricted most of. my movement and motorskills..I could physically see the aura of this energy pulsating around my body ..I was able to move my eyes to the foot of my bed and saw 4-5 non human grey entities..I was shocked and terrified for i had never seen such creatures in my life..They just stood there staring into my soul , owning me , dominating me..Then with the precision of a world reknown surgical team, they began to evaluate me..One grey ran his fingertips over my frontal cranium like he was measuring. the being to his right grabbed my right ear and dropped what must have been an implant as i felt it settle deep in my ear canal. a. different grey had a tool in his hand that scared the crap out of me and my cat when he turned it on..Imagine ur dentists drill on steroids..He applied the tool to my tooth.  there was no pain but a tremendous vibration that shook my body..This team of greys were wearing what seemed like a et gas mask and one of them shouted orders in the most scary/ancient sounding language i've ever heard...I could not believe how thin their legs were..I thought they had on prosthetics because the diameter around was no bigger than a quarter..They also smelled terrible..When they got what they wanted they faded out just as quickly as they portaled in..My bed was soo hot like it had been microwaved..The aura of energy that surrounded my body was powerful and left risidual effects for a good 3-5 mins...I lay wide awake in my bed trembling after their departure until day light..Despite wanting to run for the hills, i was too frightened to do anything
content.summary: Greys terrorize me in my own bedroom

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing along the ohio river with a friend in vevay, indiana
when out the corner of my right eye i noticed seeing a light through the trees didnt think much of it at first thought it was a plane then turned to look at it and noticed it was just staying there and noticed 2 lights i turned to my friend and said do you see that then turned back to look at it and then it started moving real slow and could see 1 light was white never flashed and the 2nd light was was blueish and never flashed the white light was in front and blue in the back it was solid in between the lights looked the size of a pencil eraser it looked bout 4 inches long and cigar shaped and 500 feet away and bout a few inches above the tree then it took off really fast straight across the river to ghent, ky then it was gone just dissapeared then my friend posted a comment on facebook asking if anyone seen the strange lights over vevay
content.summary: Cigar shaped with 2 lights

content.city: Santa Marta (Distrito Turístico Cultural E Histórico)
content.detailedDescription:
Hello, greetings from santa marta, colombia, south america.
from childhood i have been convinced that we planted a seed here and genetically manipulated by beings from other worlds through the ages. i've always been fascinated by the pleiades and orion's belt, do not know why, but i think we come from there.

in 2008 i had the privilege of observing an object lens-shaped, reddish in full, no sound, no flashing lights and had traveled with a constant speed from east to west with direction to the caribbean sea.
unfortunately i have no photographic record of the event, neither witnesses because i was alone in the apartment, they were all traveling, it happened around 9 pm. what it made me curious is that after 10 minutes, a helicopter bell 212 type base of the police anti-narcotics, flew over the city with the lights off for more than 15 minutes.

on april 22, 2011, a nephew of mine, was taking photographs at sunset in the city of barranquilla with a cell phone, and was surprised to see in the picture an object with the naked eye saw not, but i believe that emits light own, because they stay in the picture like a shadow (attached shipping the original photo).
content.summary: Lenticular object round, reddish, without sound, fully illuminated.
content.locationName: Santa Marta (Distrito Turístico Cultural E Histórico), Magdalena

content.detailedDescription: Will talk to investigator.
content.summary: Seen numerous unexplained objects from the age of 12 to present

content.detailedDescription: Will talk to investigator.
content.summary: Seen numerous unexplained objects from the age of 12 to present

content.detailedDescription: On friday, june 14, 2012 myself, father, brother, and sister were enjoying an early father's day dinner out on our deck. around 10:15pm my sister and brother came back outside on the deck and immediate my brother blurted out, "what the heck is that?!?" sitting in my gazebo with my dad i was sure i was going to have to tell him that it was just a plane. it was a cloudy night so you couldn't see any stars or the moon. i bent down to get a better view and off to the west looking i immediately saw 3 hovering orange lights in a triangle formation. the lights didn't move and were as bright as street lights viewed a block away. i knew i wasn't seeing a plane, helicopter, or anything familiar. i quickly exited the gazebo and ran down the deck stairs toward the levy to get a better look. as the four of us ran, i called to my neighbor who was outside with 2 children. all three of them ran over and we watched what we now noticed were 4 orange lights hovering. i tried to record them with my camera phone but as anyone with a camera phone knows that even taking a clear picture of the moon is almost impossible. we watched for a minute as they seem to ascended into the clouds one by one. i'm not sure how long they were present below the clouds but we saw them for about a minute and a half total.
content.summary: At least 4 large glowing orange object below cloud cover witnessed by 7

content.detailedDescription:
Driving along canandaigua lake,ny to naples, ny it was a bright sunny afternoon around 445pm and i looked to my left over the lake and approximately 200 feet from the road hovering above the tree lines i saw a round sphere about 20 to 30 feet across.  it was a very bright metallic color with a glow around the outside of the sphere.  at first i thought it was a helicopter but there was no sound it was just hovering there.  i reached over on my seat to grab my cellphone to take a picture and when i turned to take the picture it was all the way on the other side of the lake barely seeble and then it disappeared this all took place within 3 seconds.  i drove down the road further approximately 1/8 of a mile looking and when i came to the next area of trees there it was again.  it was approx. 2 minutes from the first sighting that i saw this sphere.  i do not know if it was the same sphere or a second one.  i had the phone in my lap and raised it to take a picture it was still hovering over the trees, as i went to focuse in for the photo, it shot off across the lake again and disappearred out of site within approx. 2 seconds. it has remained in my mind and i constantly have the needy feeling to return to the site.  

this has not been my first experience of seeing similar crafts.  while i had lived in europe i had also seen similar ufo's in various areas.
content.summary: Spotted a sphere-like ufo along a finger lake in ny

content.detailedDescription: Walking down street in kokomo 2 blocks from my house. seen what looked like a star ..Stationary. i dismised for a second till i seen vertical, horizontal movement. i never believed things to much like this but last night... ok. the movement was so intricate and seeming impossible for any type of aircraft i know of. lasted not more than 3 min... exact time.. was 159am.. til 202 aproximate.. the starlike object vanished after.
content.summary: Walking down the street. i seen what i thought was a star then impossible movement.

content.detailedDescription: while i was standing on our front lawn at 10:15 p.M. i happened to look up at the night sky. i saw this brilliant light. at first i thought it was a star,but then it started to move. it traveled in a ne to se direction. it was about 10,000 ft.High. i know this because i sky dive. i was looking for blinking lights which normal aircraft have but there were none. at that altitude you could hear the sound of a jet or a propellar. there was none.It was absolutely silent. it glowed like quick silver. i wathhed it as it traveled out of sight.It took about 2 minutes for this event to happen.
content.summary: A solid glowing silver object traveling nw to ne  direction

content.detailedDescription:
My wife took a photo with her nikon d5000 out of our hotel room in toronto. only later did we notice what appears to be  very bright two light orbs with halos and one smaller spherical object above them.

i thought maybe the lights were from a plane, although they seem way too bright against a sunset sky to be plane headlights, and the small orb above and slightly to the left appears almost perfectly spherical and doesn't look like a plane at all, to me.

any information on what the researchers here think these objects might be would be welcome.
content.summary: Saw on image after photo was taken

content.detailedDescription:
My wife took a photo with her nikon d5000 out of our hotel room in toronto. only later did we notice what appears to be  very bright two light orbs with halos and one smaller spherical object above them.

i thought maybe the lights were from a plane, although they seem way too bright against a sunset sky to be plane headlights, and the small orb above and slightly to the left appears almost perfectly spherical and doesn't look like a plane at all, to me.

any information on what the researchers here think these objects might be would be welcome.
content.summary: Saw on image after photo was taken

content.detailedDescription: I was north bound on the 5 freeway passing magnolia blvd approx.12:30 am june 17th 2012. i saw a large bright orange light fading in an out about 400 ft above the freeway an about 300 ft ahead of me. i slowed down as did the car next to me, it was stationary so as i drove under it, it looked to me like a ball of fire. it was extremely bright a portion of it was red an i saw actual flames, but at the same time the light was fading in an out. it then took off south bound horizontal over the freeway. i got off at oxnard as it was 50 ft in front of me turned right, it was now 15 miles from me an watched the light turn into a small spec an then disappeared.
content.summary: Fireball over 5 freeway north bound north hollwood

content.detailedDescription: Outside sitting on the porch. a very bright red light was glowing (not blinking). it wasn't moving but it was changing colors rapidly not like a flash but just smooth changing light. after watching it for about 10 mins. it completely disappeared like something zapped it. it was completely lower than the stars but it was an awesome color. my husband went to go get the camera and as soon as he walked out it disappeared.
content.summary: Very bright red/yellow glow in the sky disappeared like something zapped it

content.detailedDescription: Initially saw three big bright lights low in the horizon.  my first thought was jet fighters with extremely large head lights. as they got closer they appeared to pulsate like fire and become larger but no sound.  then the one on the right arced to the right at a rapid speed. the one on the left began a sharp acr to the right as well.  the one in the center made a fast sharp left turn. when that happened the other two stopped their direction and instantly resumed formation with the center one.  as they headed in this new direction all three of their lights became faint and they disappeared over the tree line.  these things travelled way faster than any plan in the sky and changed direction instantly. i called for anyone to look, my wife and son came out and saw the three as they began to fade.
content.summary: Three bright lights zig zag through the sky

content.detailedDescription: Initially saw three big bright lights low in the horizon.  my first thought was jet fighters with extremely large head lights. as they got closer they appeared to pulsate like fire and become larger but no sound.  then the one on the right arced to the right at a rapid speed. the one on the left began a sharp acr to the right as well.  the one in the center made a fast sharp left turn. when that happened the other two stopped their direction and instantly resumed formation with the center one.  as they headed in this new direction all three of their lights became faint and they disappeared over the tree line.  these things travelled way faster than any plan in the sky and changed direction instantly. i called for anyone to look, my wife and son came out and saw the three as they began to fade.
content.summary: Three bright lights zig zag through the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Buddy and i are out fishin on beaver lake about 11pm.  i say, "hey, you see that....You see that!!"  "ya, yaa, i can see that!  "look how bright that is, are you seein that?"  "ya i see it"  "man, that's a ufo, you done seen yourself a ufo!!"  

to the east about 60 degrees up off the horizon (about 2 o'clock)we see a bright orange fireball (looked like it was fireball from a symmetrical round object entering the atmosphere coming toward us). not a fast streak of a meteor, not the big smoky or amorphous billowy burn like the shuttle, not a missile leaving the atmosphere.  this started as a small orange point,in a split second got bright firey orange and as big as an pencil eraser held at arms length, way brighter than the stars (like a little orange sun). it was firey at the edges. over the next 5 or 7 seconds it got darker and darker orange and smaller in intensity.  as it approached the size of big star, it lost its orange and was now white, bright as a medium star.  the object was not moving in any direction at this point, like it was coming straight down at us. when it turned white, it started moving to the north about the speed of a plane, way slower than a satellite, and definitely on a different trajectory. there was a plane in the sky at the same time moving from northwest to southeast at high altitude (could still see lights blinking but couldn't hear it), and the object was going about the same speed.  the object continued going north and the light from it slowly faded as it got further away.  
i spose it could have been space junk, but the white part stayed consistently white (no flux), and didn't look like it was falling or burning at all, it looked like a steady white plane light slowly going north... orange part definitely looked like something entering the atmosphere.  maybe if it was space debris or a meteorite it would explain the booms heard in indiana and michigan, maybe even explain the radiation readings!
content.summary: Out fishin,  clear starry night sky,  orange fireball enters the atmosphere, dulls into a white star then travels north at speed of plane.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object appear close to the same spot it did last night except it flew directly over my house and vanished over it. i recorded it on my video camera once again. there are some very odd things going on in the skies over long island at night. 4th event i was able to capture in 4 nights this has been happening for 3 weeks now.
content.summary: Bluish white light that vanished

content.detailedDescription:
As a amateur stargazer, i'm pretty familiar with the night sky.  i was actually  scanning the sky for passing satellites.  looking toward the eastern sky, at first i saw three orange triangles moving
across from east to west.  no sound or any movement variation between the
three lights.  as i watched them fly above, the triangular lights were
brighter toward their centers.  as the lights were overhead, you could see
a structure holding them together.  it appeared to be transparent like a
cloak.  planes were also in the area passing that appeared the size of ticks compared to the size craft. as i moved to get a better view, everything
disappeared.
content.summary: Huge triangular craft over detroit

content.detailedDescription:
Beginning on june 14th, i noticed a blinking light in the night sky near the constellation libra.  after a while it blinked again, and i started counting as i watched; for the next hour it made a steady appearance every 12-15 seconds, moving very slowly and somewhat erratically from west to east through libra.  after an hour, sometime around 2200 hrs, i gave up and turned in, but it was still going and had moved perhaps a hand's with across the sky as i watched.  the following night i looked again, and the incident repeated itself in a slightly different area, again moving every 12-15 seconds in a generally eastern path through libra.  the same thing happened again saturday and sunday evenings, and i'm guessing it will probably make an appearance again tonight.  
we're graced with very clear skies in tecopa, california, about 25 miles southeast of death valley.  although  the flashes of light are not intense, they aren't hard to see once you know where to look.  i used a pair of 10x binoculars last night and located the flashes, but they didn't appear to be connected to anything, or it was so distant as to be invisible.  last night i lost sight of the flashes at 2215, so don't know if they went beyond that time on the previous nights.
content.summary: Light (or lights) blinked on and off every 12-15 seconds for over an hour, appearing to move very slowly through the constellation libra.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to get some fresh air and as i sat down on the deck chair i seen a light flash out of the side of my eye so i turned to look at it.. it was silent, traveled in a stright line for about a mile then it dissappeared abruptly..I knew right away what i had seen..
content.summary: Glowing yellowish , traveled in a stright line for about a mile the disappeared without a trace
